p: A scatter plot based on the first three components explained the morphological and biochemical diversity among the measured traits ( Figure 3A). Four distinct groups are determined: group I consists of total protein, Ca, and TC; group II consists of LL, LA, LW, SW, PH, FL, SD, FW, and DW; group III consists of Cat, POD, and PPO; and group IV consists of BN, LN, SLA, Cb, and Car.
